Datatable.LocalizationPair: Mect "Wrench" Vak
Dol "Thermo" Brek
Xat "Breaker" Ktol
Zhulok "Fist" Kruk
Tev "Nitro" Pliq
Crank "Bogey" Kruge
"Old Man" Alek
Jeka "Dart" Rult
Akrodt "Vestal" Mendrit
Sicopus "Iron" Alov
Trekker "Clear Eye" Junior
Grendelox the Greatest, Ever
Listen up bud, we're friends now. Ok? This is happening, deal with it.
Well, uh... alright then. Totally normal to make friends through force. Not suspicious at all.
Oh HEY, is thing on? Why am I so big? Oh, whatever. Well look, hello we're the Marvos. Stay out of our way or follow along, Your choice. Either way, get moving.
Look bud, this is kinda sad. Does it hurt to suck so bad? Let's just stop. There's no point fighting when we could be living, eh? Go home, we feel bad.
Sure, we can call us even. Let's move on and get back to what matters, eh?
Ok, ok, look. Lay off, alright? This war ain't worth it, you got us. Let's just move past this, ok?
Yeah ok, ok. You got us. Let's say this makes us even and move on, ay?
Why the heck would we wanna do that? Look, come back later. We got stuff goin' on right now and you got no part in that, y'hear?
Wh-, why would you do that? That's just rude!
Look, you're slowin' us down. We gotta get movin'. Catch up if you can. See ya.
What the heck! We had a thing! Don't leave us behind!
Look, you gotta go. You just gotta go. We just want you gone, got it?
Oh yeah, no, just go ahead and declare war on us. Not like we were just living our lives over here. Screw you!
Hey so, we were takin' a look around and noticed a distinct lack of explosions in the area and were wondering in you could help us wit' that. Thanks for volunteerin'.
You. Declarin' war. On us? Aw, bud, I knew you were ugly but I didn't think you were stupid too. Don't worry, we'll smack some sense into ya.
Ay, so about us. Yeah, you're really in the way. Just give us your star systems and nobody's gotta get hurt.
Oh is THAT how it's gonna be? Well, screw you too! Bring it on!
Hey, bud, listen. Bein' pals with you is REALLY frustrating. I've got a big gun pile over there and I'm just ITCHING to use it. Mind if I aim at your big dumb face?
Oh WOW. Hope you got a plan, bud, 'cause retaliation is kinda our specialty.
Oh look who it is, another hot-shot pickin' on the little guy. Eat lead n' lasers.
Y'know, you're pretty alright. What say we be pals to eachother from here on out?
Yeah bud, totally. It'll be nice not havin' to worry about eachother, and maybe we could get some trade goin'. Good idea.
Look, it's not like we don't like the idea, but we're busy doin' our things and you're busy not doing our things, yeah?
Look, it sounds all fluffy mammals and rainbows, but it wouldn't be honest. Let's keep things on ice.
Look, it just wouldn't be honest. Let's keep things on ice.
Look, it's not like we don't like the idea, but we're busy doin' our things and you're busy not doing our things, yeah?
We've been keepin' a close eye on ya and, gotta say, we like what we see. We could totally form an alliance. Whaddya say? You and us against the universe, lets get this moving.
Boom! That's what we like to see. This galaxy's a rough place. We gotta stick together. Glad to be movin' alongside ya.
Oh yeah, just let me drop everythin' and help you out so you can forget about and abandon us later, why don't I? I'll be sure to get back to ya on that.
Oh yeah, just let me drop everythin' and help you out so you can forget about and abandon us later, why don't I? I'll be sure to get back to ya on that.
Hey, y'know, we really appreciate you not tryin' to screw us over. How's about we make an alliance and get things movin'?
Nice. Looks like we're really in this for the long haul. Whatever we can do to help, let us know. Our scrap heap's your scrap heap so long as its true to other way around, eh?
Look, bud, we like havin' you as neighbors 'n all, but we're not about to let ya go borrowin' our stuff, yeah? Good fences make good neighbors 'n all that.
Look, bud, we like havin' you as neighbors n' all, but we're not about to let ya go borrowin' our stuff, yeah? Good fences make good neighbors 'n all that.
Heyy, we're lookin' to make a trade here, whaddya say?
Yeah, we can swing that. Deal.
Dude, no. Get away from our scrap pile.
Dude, no. Get away from our scrap pile.
Eh, we ain't feelin' it. That's a pass for now.
You've been real annoyin' lately, y'know? Buncha my friends wanna get blastin, but lets avoid that, yeah? I'll make ya an offer, don't refuse it.
What, you got somthin' against us? Pff, whatever.
Ey, you're alright, bud. Just thought y'should know.
Well shoot, you made me blush, thanks bud. You're pretty alright too.
Ey! Screw you too!
Aww that's adorable. Did you eat the crayons you used to write that?
Hey bud, you're in the way. Here's how you get out of it. Got it?
Aww, a demand? That's cute. Get off our screen.
Ey, yeah.. About that demand. We all thought it over and came to the conclusion that we really like the idea of shoving it right up your entitled puckers. It's on now.
It didn't have to be like this, bud. Don't say I didn't warn ya.
So, how about it? This do anything for ya?
Yeah, that'll do it.
Come on, bud! Ya gotta sweeten the pot more than that!
Come on. Really? You think we were going to go for this? Even we have standards.
Eyy, study buddies! Whaddya say?
Nice! Now maybe we can figure out this camera thing...
Look, group projects aren't really our style. We don't wanna wind up doing all the work and you takin' the credit.
Look, group projects aren't really our style. We don't wanna wind up doing all the work and you takin' the credit.
Funny, we were just about to do the same.
Guess that treat contract doesn't mean much, eh? Screw you!
Get off our lawn 'n get out of our way!
Open borders? Yeah, fine. Lets all get movin'.
GO. AWAY.
GO. AWAY.
Yeah, nope! Get outa our space. Don't like that one bit.
Hey, uh. This whole closed borders thing is real annoyin'. We got places to go, things to do. Mind openin' up?
....huh, what? Who left the screen on? Oh, I thought we rejected this. Ugh, buzz off!
Whoa! Who the heck are you? Where'd you come from?
Hey, we're the Mavros. Got any trash layin' around? No? Ah, well, pleasure to meetcha.
Hey, uh, we're a bit lost on where we should be headed, mind if we take a peek at your starcharts?
Eyy, now I see you and you see me. Try not to be boring, eh?
What, after all this time NOW you're worried about privacy?
Dude! You can't go! Where else are we gonna get those knick knacks? Maaan... things were just starting to get good..
Aw, yeah, see? There it is. Well just be sure to write our name on that project when you turn it in, yeah?
A truce? About time! Where do we sign?
Look, we've both got more important stuff to be doin', how about a truce?
A truce? Yeah, lemme think that over for a while. We'll get back to ya.
A truce? Yeah, lemme think that over for a while. We'll get back to ya.
Look, we share our charts and all of a sudden you're gonna be cloggin up our star lanes. Pass.
Look, we share our charts and all of a sudden you're gonna be cloggin up our star lanes. Pass.
Look, not gonna lie, we're really not interested in watchin' ya and you wantin' to watch us is kinda creepy.
Look, not gonna lie, we're really not interested in watchin' ya and you wantin' to watch us is kinda creepy.
We've got a buncha of stuff we don't need just laying around. How's about we swap trash n' treasure?
Eyy, how's it goin? You guys doin alright? We should hang out more.
Respect, thanks bud.
Hey, looks like we hang out with the same folks as you do. We should group up some time.
Ey, we got your back on this. Keep it up.
You look like you've got some dust burning a hole in your pocket. Funny, because we've got these ships that do the same thing to walls...
Wow, that hurts. Why you gotta be like that bud?
Now, nobody deserves what you did. Get out.
You're all up in our space. Get out before I get in a worse mood.
Past warning. Get out or we'll get you out, got it?
Not too sure how we feel about having you so close to us... Try to give us some space, yeah?
Dude! We callerd dibs on that system! Give it back!
Wazzup! Glad to see ya, bud! Need help settling in?
Y'know, it's funny, we see all this soon to be scrap flying around our systems and it just won't leave. We should do somthing about that.
Oh ho ho, it's on! You don't know when it's comin', but watch out.
Y'know, you're flying around in some pretty sketchy toasters, bud. If we were to go to war, you'd be toast.
Hey, uh. Look, how's about we make a peace deal? We're cool, right?
You double crossin' liar! I hope your kind can sleep with one eye open, you'll need it.
Yo, what the heck bud? Leave some systems for the rest of us, yeah? You're cuttin' us off here.
Well that's rude. Who needs enemies with friends like this, eh?
Alright, cool. Don't mind us, we'll just be passin' through.
Well, thanks bud. You really know how to put out a fire.

So, look. Thing is, you took all the good systems in the area. Things are getting crampt here and we need room to breathe. So we figure if you just stop breathing, maybe there'll be some air for the rest of us, yeah?
With all these large ships of yours, we can't help but feel like you're compensatin' for somthin'. You're being obnoxious and tickin' us off, get lost.
You're pretty chill, huh? No fighting, no drama. We're down with that. Keep it up.
Good move pal, glad we could come to an understandin'
That's a pretty sweet deal bud. Thanks, much apreciated.
Hmm, maybe we had the wrong idea 'bout you guys. You're not so bad.
Thanks bud. Glad you came to see things our way.
You feel big just attackin' our people like that? Don't worry, we'll cut you down to size if you want. BACK. OFF.
Don't say I didn't warn ya, bud. When your folk start askin why their kin are gettin' scrapped, we'll be sure they know it was 'cuz of your pride.
Yeah, look. I know you don't think it's that bad, but it is. War's comming bud, just thought you should know.
Yeah, no. You're WAY too close. Back off, bud. Folk arent likin' how much dirt you're grabbin'.
You and yours are in our way, bud. Ya might wanna BACK OFF before we start complainin' to the neighborhood association, got it?
We got some stuff goin' on right now and would like things quiet, ok? Stay on your side of the fence for a bit.
Lotta guns on them ships ya got there. It'd be a shame to see 'em go limp if we pulled ours out, wouldn't it?
Oh yeah, pick on the little guy. We'll be sure to remember that if and when the tables turn.
Sorry bud, I gotta report ya to our unions. Bribes aren't taken too kindly 'round these parts.
After all this time you're just gonna do us like that eh? Screw you, bud. Hope you can take the heat we'll be sendin' your way.
We could use some help figuring some stuff out and, by the looks of things, so could you. Puttin' our heads together may be a good idea, y'know?
You got some nice scrap layin' around, bud. You ever think about setting up a trade agreement between us?
Hold onto your stuff for a sec, bud. You got somthin' we need and we think we got somthin' you want too. A deal's in the works, just a sec.
Gotta say, it's nice having you around, bud. Galaxy's a better place with you in it.
Dude, this trade agreement has just been awesome. We're really likin' what you're sellin'. Thanks.
We still don't know how this screen's supposed to work, but you've been real helpful with helpin' us figure some other stuff out. Thanks.
Some friend you are. Mind explainin' what's got you in such a bad mood? 'Cuz it's pretty obvious why we're mad...
Just passing through, eh? Might wanna pass faster, bud. Trigger finger's gettin' itchy.
Thank's for keepin' off the grass. The lawn's lookin' pretty nice now.
Why's it so hard for you to hear what we're tellin' ya? Friends don't just ignore eachother like that, bud.
You lost? Get those ships gone, bud. Tick-tock.
Mind explainin' what we get outta that?
Why's it so hard for you to hear what we're tellin' ya? Friends don't just ignore eachother like that, bud
Thanks for hurrying those ships along, bud. We were gettin' kinda paranoid there.
Not gonna lie bud, kinda hurts that you havn't thought of giving us a gift to show you're serious about things workin' out here.
Hey, thanks. This really helps, y'know?
Things have been kinda boring lately. Mind if we all share feeds for a bit?
You know that whole sharing vision thing was nice, but now it's over. Sorry.
Ever curious just how much of the galaxy we've seen? Sign here, and we'll show you.
Ey, our ships keep explodin' faster than they explode other ships. Mind helping us out with that?
Ey, I know we're not close, but we're gonna have to stick together if we're gonna stand up to some of those other groups. How about we make our own alliance and watch eachother's back?
We've had some good times, right? Look, we could use some help. If we can form an alliance, there's a good chance we can all pull through. Whaddya say, bud?
That alliance over there is really living it up, isn't it? How about we form our own alliance, a better one, with black-jack and scrappers!
Woah, you're not fond of those guys either, are you? What do you say we get together and put em in their place?
Look bud. You're awesome, we're awesome, we've been awesome to eachother, but you know what'd be more awesome? Coming together and makin' an alliance.
Great minds, eh? There's room for two on this ride, yeah? What we could do is form an alliance. That way we don't gotta blow eachother up and can keep others from blowin us up, yeah?
Erm, we thought we had this war covered, but things have headed south. Fast. Help us out, we're dyin' here.
Looks like you could use some help. Just hold em off, we're sending in the big guns!
Here's a little somthing to show we care. We got this, bud. Let's keep movin'.
That's right, you're getting something from the top of the scrap heap, but you're worth it, bud.
Are you joking? 'Cuz it's not funny. Were not laughing. We thought we were in this together.
A demand? All you need to do is ask, bud! We're allies, after all. Don't you trust us?
Appreciate the gift, bud... Can't even remember what we were so mad about before. Here's to our friendship!
Look, not that we don't appreciate the offer, but that's just not gonna cut it, bud. You really hurt us and this gift doesn't really show you care.
This isn't working. You really gotta take a look in the mirror, bud. We wanna make this work but you aren't making that easy.
You coulda gotten here a bit sooner, lotta traffic? Well, still, you came. Thanks for the help, bud.
Hey, ally. If we go down, you're next. Where's our backup? Get over here!
Wh- what the heck? What'd you say to that system? Where's all the explosions? What've you done?!
Whoa whoa whoa, are you brainwashing our systems?! That's it, nope, we're out. We want NONE of that.
Whoa, this Guardian you woke-up is so cool! I mean he's totally in the way, but that alright, right?
Whoa, these tendrils make ships go faster? How fast? This is awesome!
Get in line, bud. We're busy dealin' with an actual war right now. We'll blast ya once that's over, ok?
Look, don't take it personal. We need more space and you have the space we need.
Oh look, you've fallen down. Mind if we start kickin'?
Get your ships off our turf. That blockade is stoppin' honest folk from livin'.
You scum! That was a civilian ship you idiot! You need to go... we're gonna make that happen.
Did we give you the right to awaken freaky behemoths on our planets? No! Get you grandpa or whatever out of our way!
You blew up an entire planet? Are you TRYING to be a cliche super villian?
Huh, I don't get it but you're really movin' things along for us. Thanks!
What the rift, dude? We liked that system the way it was!
Please stop brain washin' our citizens. It's existentially horrifying and creepy as hell. You don't gotta make us just like you to get us to like you.
Is it weird to wanna kill someone because they're too awesome? Yeah, it is. But you know what's not weird? Wantin' to kill someone for makin your friends 'n family think you suck.
Thanks for toning down the whole "one of us, one of us" act. It's nice knowin' we can think for ourselves.
Cool bubble trick, bud. Don't know why we're suddenly doing party tricks, but we can hang out sometime if you want! Thanks!
Cool bubble trick, bud. We Marvos got our own trick that we do with guns and explosives. You wanna see?
Alright tough guy, we get it, you got a big ol' ship with guns. That's soo cool. Now knock off the blockade before we scrap ya.
Pretty sure that's a war-crime bud. You're sure makin' it easy to recruit soldures who wanna avenge their families.
Alright, lets get some friendly competition goin' on here. Lets see who gets this set of rocks first.
DANGIT! How'd you complete that outpost so fast? Gah, frickin- enjoy the system, good game.
I don't know about you, bud. But I think it's gettin' a little hot in here. Might wanna crack a window. Who knows? Maybe you'll see our ships rollin' up.
Heh, um. Hey bud? We ever mention how grateful we are that you'd never use your cool fighter ships on us?
WHOA, STOP STOP. Geez, we're not lookin' for a fight! What do ya want? You can probably just have it!
Hey bud? Your freaky death armada's really got us on edge. Could you move em just a bit further away?
Alright bud, square up. Let's see what you got!
You're in the way. Pretty sure we told you not to do that.
What the heck is that!? You can blow up planets?! How?! Why?!
Wow, destroying planets now, eh? ...we ever mention how awesome you are?
DUDE, what the heck? Mind telling us BEFORE you go and make us galactic super villians?!
We had a deal, bud! Lets see if your ships are as worthless as your word.
Huh, well, um. Yeah, we could be friends. That's cool I guess. You could've just asked though.
Oh heeey... buddy! Yeahhh, glad to, er, see ya! How ya been?
Wait, what? You're serious? I mean... that's cool but don't you hate us?
Huh, crazy. You're actually pretty cool. Who would've guessed?
Dude, if you're gonna bother forcing peace, you gotta do somthin' to make us wanna stay in it once it expires. Peace out.
We're thinkin' you should show how serious you are about bein' at peace with us. Got anythin' comin' to mind?
That gift you sent? We appreciate it. We're doing swell things with it, let me tell you. Peace is good, huh?
So, no gift, huh? Well, this peace isn't doin' much for us otherwise. You're kinda boring.
Yeah, so, that forced alliance thing was weird, right? Let's see how war works out.
Oh my gosh, dude. SHUT. UP. Leave us alone!
